text_auction_min_deposit_confirmation: You are about to pay auction deposit from your account balace, Do you want to proceed?
text_auction_min_deposit_confirmation_he:
Please note that this deposit is refundable if you are not the winner and will be deducted of the total purchase price in case of winning.

 Please make sure that you have a sufficient balance in your account for this process.
text_min_deposit_paid_successfully: Auction deposit has been paid successfully
